name: Achilleas Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were greatly impressed by this hotel. The most important features for us when we travel has to be location and price. On these two criterea alone, the Achilleas scores top marks.
reviews.title: A superb hotel !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has recently been re-refurbished. All the previous stained carpets which other reviewers referred to seem to have been removed and replaced by wooden flooring. The spotlessly clean foyer of the hotel was a good indication of the hotel's hygene standards. I didn't see any wear and tear (though this was February and I imagine most hoteliers use this period to do repairs etc).
reviews.title: Great location, good rooms

reviews.text: Our room was very large, I suppose it was a family room and was very comfortable. I loved the firm matress and the TV worked well with a good variety of English language, Greek and French programmes. Only the bathroom was rather old fashioned. Although very clean and providing hot water throughout the day and night, the shower unit was a 'climb into' affair with a hand-held spray and no wall mounting. The bathroom lighting could also have been softer, florescent lights are somewhat brutal first thing in the morning! Still, these really are small points.
reviews.title: Good choice & location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't hesitate to book this outstanding hotel. A five minute walk to the metro (where trains leave for the airport every 30 mins, €10 for two people) and in a very safe and upmarket part of town. You can't go wrong!
reviews.title: okay hotel

reviews.text: I stayed two nights at the Achilleas at the beginning of September, and really enjoyed it. The location is fantastic--within walking distance of Syntagma Square and the Evzones changing of the guard in front of the parliament building, Plaka, Monastiraki, and all the ancient sites. It's also close to the metro stop that goes straight to Piraeus (the harbor towns where the ferries leave from).
reviews.title: Great Central Location!

description: Achilleas Hotel is a cozy family friendly hotel in Athens, just few minutes walk from Syntagma Square, Plaka, Thision and the Acropolis. Featuring 34 spacious, airy and bright rooms, that can accommodate up to 5 persons, it’s one of the few hotels near Syntagma Athens, which is ideal for students, families or friends, since its 30 sq.m. suites offer 2 separate rooms, providing privacy and comfort. The rooms also feature a large closet, TV, desk, safe, nice fully renovated bathrooms with bath products, hairdryer, a mini fridge and they are all fully air conditioned. Achilleas Hotel offers free Wifi Internet to its guests and complimentary breakfast buffet.
